title: Bitcoin Price Analysis:  Technicals at Play - 26 June 2023
description:
BTC/USD Guided by Short-Term Technicals:  Sally Ho’s Technical Analysis – 26 June 2023

Bitcoin (BTC/USD) added to ongoing range expansion early in the Asian session as the pair was softer after peaking around the 31057.86 area, a move that represented a test of the 61.8% retracement of the recent depreciating range from 31443.67 to 30330.61.  Prior to the move higher, buying pressure emerged around the 30330.61 area, right around the 61.8% retracement of the recent appreciating range from 29539.57 to 31443.67.   BTC/USD continues to orbit the 38.2% retracement of this range while awaiting technical guidance.   The recent rapid appreciation to the 31443.67 area was its strongest level in twelve months and represented a test of the 31488.23 area, an upside price objective associated with buying pressure that strengthened around the 26637.41 area.   Stops were also recently elected above the 30127.80 area during the ongoing appreciation, an upside price objective associated with historical buying pressure that emerged around the 15460 and 19568.52 areas.  Stops were also triggered above additional upside price objectives around the 29068, 29159, 29458, 30088, 30200, 30292, and 30477 levels. 

Additional upside price objectives include the 31737, 32125, and 33569 areas.  Stops are cited above additional upside price objectives around the 31674, 32043, 34531, and 34658 areas.  Following recent upside price activity, areas of technical support and potential buying pressure include the 30192, 29863, 29423, 28886, 28179, 28096, and 27293 areas.  Technicians are closely watching to see how much technical support develops around the 28095.44 area, representing the 23.6% retracement of the historical depreciating range from 69000 to 15460.  Traders are observing that the 50-bar MA (4-hourly) is bullishly indicating above the 100-bar MA (4-hourly) and above the 200-bar MA (4-hourly).  Also, the 50-bar MA (hourly) is bullishly indicating above the 100-bar MA (hourly) and above the 200-bar MA (hourly).

Price activity is nearest the 50-bar MA (4-hourly) at 28341.03 and the 50-bar MA (Hourly) at 30549.31.

Technical Support is expected around 24440.41/ 23270.10/ 22769.39 with Stops expected below.

Technical Resistance is expected around 31986.16/ 32989.19/ 34658.69 with Stops expected above.  

On 4-Hourly chart, SlowK is Bullishly above SlowD while MACD is Bearishly below MACDAverage.

On 60-minute chart, SlowK is Bearishly below SlowD while MACD is Bearishly below MACDAverage.                                   

 

Disclaimer: Sally Ho’s Technical Analysis is provided by a third party, and for informational purposes only. It does not reflect the views of Crypto Daily, nor is it intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, or financial advice.

title: Discover The Ultimate Guide To New Crypto, Caged Beasts
description:
The market for meme coins seems to be constantly evolving. Caged Beasts (BEASTS), a project currently making headlines for its new presale, is the latest addition to this trend.

The goal of this guide is to discuss the unique features that distinguish Caged Beasts from the many other meme coins available

Caged Beasts: What's The Lowdown?

As a result of actively engaging its community and harnessing its power, Caged Beasts is emerging as an innovative crypto venture propelled by public participation and engagement. There is an anticipation of exceptional gains among investors for the upcoming meme presale, which has sparked a wave of excitement.

Dedicated to the thriving NFT scene, Caged Beasts wants to make a lasting impact.

Is Caged Beasts An Earning Opportunity?

Without a doubt. If you share your carefully selected referral code to help others acquire $BEASTS tokens, you will enjoy a 20% share of the amount deposited in reputable cryptocurrencies such as Ethereum, Binance Coin, or Tether. Simple, straightforward, and convenient are the hallmarks of this streamlined approach.

As soon as someone uses your code, you'll receive their referral reward, which seamlessly accumulates in your wallet, giving you the opportunity for limitless profits.

Community Building with Caged Beasts

Caged Beasts focuses heavily on creating a community-driven ecosystem instead of conventional investment avenues. It gives users the power to generate their own referral codes to earn an additional 20% in tokens for themselves and their friends. As a result of this clever feature, the community thrives, which fuels demand and can lead to price appreciation in the future.

In addition to being enthusiastic participants in the pre-sale, investors engage in effective promotion, attracting a wider audience and improving the chances of making significant returns. Investors actively contribute to the project's growth by raising awareness and participating in it, which creates a profitable ecosystem. Everyone benefits from that.

Insight Into Caged Beasts Tokenomics

A key distinguishing feature of Caged Beasts is a strategic allocation of funds during the presale, with a significant 30% reserved for active engagement and the building of anticipation among investors.

Featuring a large token supply of 10T, Caged Beasts offers tax-free trading, enabling users to navigate the market faster and execute transactions more easily.

In terms of the project's development, the presale accounts for 60%. By securing 30% of the funds until the launch, the project ensures liquidity and establishes long-term stability and success.

A further 25% of Caged Beasts' ecosystem is dedicated to community incentives, further highlighting its commitment to creating a dynamic community. In order to foster collaboration, growth, and shared success, Caged Beasts prioritizes the interests of the community.

Moreover, Caged Beasts allocates an impressive 15% of its funding to the exchange wallet, which demonstrates its unwavering commitment to liquidity and support. By establishing this reserve, the project is demonstrating its commitment to making a major impact in the crypto space and establishing itself as a leading player.

Its potential for success has been boosted by experts who see Caged Beasts as a formidable competitor poised to rival well-established coins such as Dogecoin and Shiba Inu.
